extendedInfo.description: Remote Keyboard allows you to use your PC keyboard to enter text on your Android device.- Automatically detects and connects to server- Easy to use!*This app is an Input method and does not Launch*Requires Remote Keyboard Sever. Server is a trial. Full version $3AUD See website1.07:Fixed unlock persistence.

reviews.title: Nice concept, some problems, works with Japanese
reviews.comment: Hard to connect between my PC and Mobile, Problem with my Mail client, it recognizes the text box as a single line, so can\'t write any thing...  With a normal keyboard I can press back and unfocus the text box allowing me to write address and title, but with this app it just quit my Mail... The mail client is the default one provided by AU(KDDI Japan). 30 tries wasn\'t enough to understand the app, it took me 10 minutes to use dose 30 tries. Good thing, it worked with Japanese characters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am a career computer guy. Can\'t make this app work. Uninstalled.
